name: Domino Sandbox
description:
Minimalist style domino sandbox. Build your domino effect with unlimited pieces, customizable colors and reversibility.


Well-crafted build tool make it fun and easy to try out new ideas.


Minimalist style with maximum customization. Express your artistic mind through the customization feature.


Don't be afraid to push and have fun with your creation. You can revert every placed pieces back anytime. Build - Push - Revert - Repeat!


Imagine magic domino box with unlimited pieces inside. Limitation is only your imagination.



Key Features
    [Freely add / rotate / flip / remove pieces.All placed pieces can be revert back anytime.Pieces and ground's colors can be customize.Unlimited pieces. ]
